alert.note: Alert for Cascades in Lane County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 3:08PM PST until February 26 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches, except 5 to 12 inches above 2000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Cascades in Lane County. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
